DOC.brief_summary: The multicenter study evaluate diagnostic performance 3.0 T contrast-enhanced whole-heart coronary MRA patient suspect coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Contrast-Enhanced Whole-Heart Coronary Magnetic Resonance Angiography 3.0-T : A Multicenter Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter trial evaluate diagnostic ability 3.0 T contrast-enhanced whole-heart coronary MRA detect significant coronary artery stenosis among patient suspect CAD . A total 272 patient prospectively enrol 8 city China .
DOC.criteria: Suspected CAD , schedule DSA Sinus rhythm Contraindications MR examination : pacemaker , intraauricular implant , intracranial clip , thoracotomy , claustrophobia , orthopnea Acute coronary syndrome Atria fibrillation Coronary stent Bypass graft Renal insufficiency ( estimate glomerular filtration rate assess creatinine clearance < 60 ml/min/1.73 m2 )
